name: podlite-web
description: ðŸ“– Create static websites with Next.js and the Podlite markup language.

scripts.makeindex: rm -rf out_index && cp -Rp out out_index && find ./out_index -type f ! -name "*.html" ! -name "*.HTML" -delete && find ./out_index -type f -name '*.*' -exec sh -c 'mv "$0" "${0%.*}"' '{}' \; && pagefind --site ./out_index --output-path ./out/pagefind --glob '**/*' && cp -Rp ./out/pagefind ./public/pagefind && rm -rf out_index
scripts.start: yarn process "$@" && yarn build && next start
scripts.postinstall: yarn config set --home enableTelemetry 0 && next telemetry disable
scripts.export: yarn process "$@" && yarn build && next export -o out && yarn makeindex
scripts.export-tgz: yarn export "$@" >/dev/null && mv out site && tar czf -  site | cat
scripts.export-zip: yarn export "$@" && mv out site && zip -r - site | cat
scripts.process__: yarn clean && mkdir -p built && ts-node -P tsconfig-node.json bin/makeDataSource.ts
scripts.process: yarn ci && yarn clean && yarn && yarn publisher_path  "$@"
scripts.publisher_path: yarn  attach_path ${0:-pub}  ; yarn publisher  -i ${0}/index.pod6  -d ${0}  "$@" ${0}'/**/*.{pod6,podlite}' && ( ( [ -e ${0}/package.json ] && cd ${0} && yarn post_plugin ) ; true ) &&  yarn ci
